<meta name="description" content="Elevate your yacht charter experience and add a Flitescooter board! 
Instructor available upon request for an additional charge. Flitescooter 
board rental starts at $499.00 per board, reserve yours today for $99.00 
down per board. Comes fully charged for usage, batteries last for 
approximately 1-2 hours depending on riders style. Charger also included. 
Max load 225lbs.

The rental duration of this toy is for the length of your entire charter.

Items are provided by an independent 3rd party vendor, 48 hours notice is 
required prior to your booking date to rent this item. Vendor will collect 
your remaining balance of $400.00 per board prior to your rental date." />

<meta name="description" content="A floating Cabana, the perfect add-on for unforgettable relaxation and 
luxury. Picture yourself lounging in the sun, a gentle breeze brushing over 
your skin, while you float effortlessly behind your yacht. This spacious 
and stable floating oasis offers plush seating and ample space for 
sunbathing, sipping refreshing drinks, or enjoying a gourmet picnic with 
friends and family. Whether it's a lively gathering or an intimate moment, 
the Floating Cabana provides a serene and private escape right on the 
water, making it ideal for celebrating special occasions or simply 
indulging in pure bliss.

Anchored just behind your yacht, the cabana lets you immerse yourself in 
the natural splendor of the ocean while enjoying the privacy and comfort of 
your own floating retreat. Designed with high-quality materials for a 
premium experience, the Floating Cabana ensures safety and stability, 
giving you peace of mind as you relax. Don’t miss out on this extraordinary 
add-on—reserve your Floating Cabana today and make your yacht charter an 
unforgettable experience. Indulge in luxury, embrace tranquility, and 
discover the ultimate floating lounge.

Items are provided by an independent 3rd party vendor, 48 hours notice is 
required prior to your booking date to rent this item.

Cabanas rentals start at $349.00 per cabana for delivery and setup." />

<meta name="description" content="Add on a Floating Lounge Chair, the perfect addition for ultimate 
relaxation. Imagine yourself reclining in a luxurious lounge chair, the 
gentle sway of the ocean beneath you, as you float peacefully behind your 
yacht. The floating lounge chairs are designed for comfort and style, 
providing an ideal spot for sunbathing, enjoying a refreshing drink, or 
sharing a conversation with friends and family. Perfect for lively 
gatherings or tranquil escapes, they offer a unique, private sanctuary on 
the water, making any occasion special.

Positioned just behind your yacht, the Floating Lounge Chair allows you to 
fully immerse yourself in the beauty of the ocean while enjoying the 
privacy and comfort of your own floating haven. Crafted from high-quality 
materials for a premium experience, these lounge chairs ensure stability 
and safety, letting you relax with complete peace of mind. Don’t miss out 
on this luxurious add-on—reserve your Floating Lounge Chair today and 
elevate your yacht charter to an extraordinary experience.

Items are provided by an independent 3rd party vendor, 48 hours notice is 
required prior to your booking date to rent this item.

Each chair is $99.00 and there is a two chair minimum to rent for delivery 
and setup." />

skis (SEABOBs). Easy to ride for young and old. Recommended age is 12+. 
Seabob rentals start at $499.00 per Seabob, reserve yours today for $99.00 
down per Seabob. Two Seabobs are recommended for a group of 4 or more 
people that want to participate in this water activity. Comes fully charged 
for usage, batteries last for approximately 1-2 hours depending on riders 
style. Charger also included.

The rental duration of this toy is for the length of your entire charter.

Items are provided by an independent 3rd party vendor, 48 hours notice is 
required prior to your booking date to rent this item. Vendor will collect 
your remaining balance of $400.00 per Seabob prior to your rental date." />

catering.title: Bread Bowl Dip Platter — Miami Yachting Company
catering.description: Indulge in our freshly baked bread bowl, overflowing with a rich and creamy spinach dip. Made from a warm pumpernickel loaf, this delectable dish comes with generous bites of pumpernickel and marble rye bread, perfect for dipping. Experience a flavor sensation that will elevate your gathering and delight your guests. Treat yourself to this irresistible appetizer today!

<meta name="description" content="Made fresh to order, select from one of the following combinations. To 
begin customizing your platter, first add it to your cart.

    * Roast Beef includes:

          o Top round Roast Beef, Swiss Cheese, garlic and herb spread,
            spinach, tomatoes, dill pickles, black olives marinated
            artichokes and green pepper rolled in lavish bread.

    * Italian Includes:

          o Tavern Ham, capocollo, Genoa salami, provolone cheese, garlic
            and herb spread, spinach, tomatoes, marinated artichokes, and
            green peppers rolled in lavash bread.

    * Turkey, bacon, and Avocado includes:

          o Oven roasted turkey breast, bacon, garlic and herb spread,
            guacamole and spinach rolled in lavash bread.

    * Ham and Cheese includes:

          o Tavern Ham, yellow American cheese, garlic and herb spread,
            shredded lettuce, and pickles rolled in lavash bread.

    * Vegetarian includes:

          o Garlic and herb spread, spinach, tomatoes, matchstick carrots,
            mushrooms, black olives, marinated artichokes, sunflower seeds
            and guacamole rolled in lavash bread." />

<meta name="description" content=""Something Blue Before I Do" ...a.k.a...The Splurge Package

The ultimate but playful way to celebrate before the big day. This package 
adds just the right amount of bachelorette flair without going overboard. 
Perfect for relaxed groups who want cute photos, easy vibes, and a stress 
free yacht experience.

Includes
Something blue before I do banner Bride themed cups for onboard drinks
Bride to be crown with sash and veil
Engagement ring float for water photos Ribbon themed straws Bachelorette 
boat day accessories for the entire group (travel case, sunglasses, 
scrunchy, keepsake bracelet, hair clip)

‍Optional Upgrade Add a memory keepsake drone video of your experience" />
